catan.network

Class Communication

  • java.lang.Object
    • catan.network.Communication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Messenger, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Communication
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Messenger
    Class which provide us P2P architecture and basic communication in an internal network. What is more, this class send messegas, create new threads for every peer and one for itself for listening servport.
    Author:
    Sebastian

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface catan.network.Messenger

        Messenger.NumberOf

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Communication getInstance()
        This is a proper way to get an instance of this class.
        Returns:
        Instance of this singleton.

      • initCommunication

        public void initCommunication(java.lang.String myName,
                              java.util.Collection<PlayerIP> players,
                              database.Board board)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Method to initialize Communication.
        Parameters:
        myName - Our nickname which is propagate into network.
        players - Collection which contain all players in our database.
        board - Board which will be modified during the game.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When creating ServSocket fails.

      • addPlayerIP

        public void addPlayerIP(PlayerIP p)
        Adding new PlayerIP to PlayerIP collection with adding nickname, creating new peer
        Parameters:
        p - New PlayerIP to add

      • sendInvitations

        public void sendInvitations(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> names)
        Method needed to send invitations to players.
        Parameters:
        names - Chosen players nicknames

      • startGame

        public boolean startGame()
        Creating a game. Whenever number of players is wrong it fails. In case of success this method sends Start_Game message to all who accepted, to the rest abandon.
        Returns:
        boolean value, false - starting game failed, true - starting game succeed

      • abandonGame

        public void abandonGame()
        Useful when you have sent invitations, but you don't want to create a game. This method sends to all invited players abandon message.

      • getPlace

        public int getPlace()
        After starting a game, all players send dice result. If we have all results, we know sequence of players.
        Returns:
        number is positive or equal 0. Number says which is our place, but when number is equal 0 that means, not everyone has sent me a result and it was impossible to create sequence.

      • sendUpdate

        public void sendUpdate(database.Board board)
        It should be a first message for a host of this game. This method propagate our board to all players.
        Specified by:
        sendUpdate in interface Messenger
        Parameters:
        board - Board to propagate.

      • sendUpdate

        public void sendUpdate(database.Tile tile,
                       int index)
        Method useful to update a tile. It will be necessary in case of thief moving.
        Specified by:
        sendUpdate in interface Messenger
        Parameters:
        tile - Tile object which has been modified.
        index - Index of this tile in our board.

      • sendUpdate

        public void sendUpdate(database.Node node,
                       int index)
        Sends update message to all players. Needed whenever some node of our graph has been changed. Useful after building new city, road etc.
        Specified by:
        sendUpdate in interface Messenger
        Parameters:
        node - Node object which has been modified.
        index - Index of this node in our board.

      • sendUpdate

        public void sendUpdate(Messenger.NumberOf what,
                       int quantity)
        Everyone has to know how many resource card i have. (Thief)
        Specified by:
        sendUpdate in interface Messenger
        Parameters:
        what - It might be DICE or RESOURCE
        quantity - Number of what parameter.

      • sendTrade

        public void sendTrade(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> give,
                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> get)
        Sends to all players my offert.
        Specified by:
        sendTrade in interface Messenger
        Parameters:
        give - HashMap which contains names of resources and their quantity. This resources we are giving to somebody.
        give - HashMap which contains names of resources and their quantity. This resources we are getting from somebody.

      • sendTrade

        public void sendTrade(java.lang.String nick)
        Whenever a player accepts our offer, then we can make this transaction true by sending deal message.
        Specified by:
        sendTrade in interface Messenger
        Parameters:
